column5: Hit the lake with Fishing Barry and SilveradoSheriff for some Lake O action, Great day going 15 for 16 of mostly Bows. Best results came in the 400 ft water 35 ft down. Everything worked Riggers,Dispey and leadcore.You can see these guys were in the river in the past year as there tails are worn down digging the redds.
Nice catch guys !!!!   man i love the blue zone,its one of my fav spots.  ..glad you had a great day,gotta love the fight from them fresh bows...nice pics too...cheers
Had a blast Rob - nice work out there!  SS.
Thanks FD, It's pretty awesome fishing out there. And get this not  another soul around. Working on some video I took out there. I'll try to post tonight.
Great pics, looks like ya had an eventful, and fish filled day eh
nice fish,looks like you had a good day
Great report and pics....makes me look forward to when they enter the tribs!!!  Hope we get some good rains though....or it could be a tough year for them.
Nice fish Iceguy. I've heard a few guys using the term blue zone lately. Can anyone explain to me what this is?  I'm just learning about fishing the big lake this year.  Thanks  Mike
The blue zone is about 12- 16 miles off shore, We head out of humber launch. Lot's of good fishing just have to be careful with the wave and weather.
